name: d3-scale-interactive
description: Provides an interface for modifying your d3 scales in the browser.
author: Peter Beshai <peter.beshai@gmail.com> (http://github.com/pbeshai)

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run css
scripts.css: cp src/d3-scale-interactive.css build/d3-scale-interactive.css && cp src/d3-scale-interactive.css example/d3-scale-interactive.css
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-scale-interactive.js -c -m -o build/d3-scale-interactive.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-scale-interactive.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-scale-interactive.js build/d3-scale-interactive.min.js build/d3-scale-interactive.css
